snippet: The culinary magazine Bon Appétit and the retailer Banana Republic are working together, along with OpenTable, to promote an apparel collection called Desk to Dinner.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column explores novel collaboration between Bon Appetit magazine and Banana Republic that will promote the clothier's new 'Desk to Dinner' line.
lead_paragraph: The culinary magazine Bon Appétit and the retailer Banana Republic are working together, along with OpenTable, to promote an apparel collection called Desk to Dinner.

headline.seo: Food and Clothing Join Forces in a New Campaign
headline.main: Pairing the Right Clothes and the Right Table
headline.print_headline: Pairing the Right Clothes and the Right Table
